description: Care home residents are expected to be vaccinated against the virus from Monday.
title: Covid: Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine to be delivered in Jersey
title_page: Covid: Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine to be delivered in Jersey - BBC News
maintext: He said the government had taken the "incredibly difficult decision" to ask all care home residents to shield from Tuesday because "we cannot vaccinate people who are sick".
